text:
@EliStokols @PressSec Oh yes it does, @PressSec #KayleighMcEnany, Trump's COVID19 response speaks for itself. The approval numbers go down as pandemic disaster numbers go up. Funny how that happens

He may not have caused #COVID19 but his ineptitude made/makes it far worse than it ever had to be
